channel.title: [Toplist] Moderator Read! Important!
channel.description:
This is my last thread that i will be making since my old one's didnt helped me. So what happend is, i got back stabbed by an friend, he hacked my status page, and it was on hes account. so he uses my Ip to get hes owner server 100%, he just edited the advertisements things, and now hes asking cash from me, then he will delete it, the point is, if i want to add a new no-ip, then i cant approve my server, since it results to the same ip as the other one, i would like to if im able to get my host back, just give me a reset link that i must open on the vps, i would like to. i lost over 40+ players of this, incase i would get +. Please help me, the Ip is:
concription.no-ip.biz

item.title: [Toplist] Moderator Read! Important!
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

oldschool-scape:

^ U can check everyother IP if u go to the server status page.

unless you don’t put on morparscape statues page/ runelocus

Read full topic

item.title: [Toplist] Moderator Read! Important!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I’m sorry, but I really don’t understand what you’re trying to say… Your status page advertisement was hijacked?

Read full topic

item.title: [Toplist] Moderator Read! Important!
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“concript, post:3, topic:429966”][quote author=heatrn11 link=topic=532647.msg3893380#msg3893380 date=1327100172]

This is my last thread that i will be making since my old one’s didnt helped me.
So what happend is, i got back stabbed by an friend, he hacked my status page, and it was on hes account.
so he uses my Ip to get hes owner server 100%, he just edited the advertisements things, and now
hes asking cash from me, then he will delete it, the point is, if i want to add a new no-ip, then i cant
approve my server, since it results to the same ip as the other one, i would like to if im able
to get my host back, just give me a reset link that i must open on the vps, i would like to.
i lost over 40+ players of this, incase i would get +.
Please help me, the Ip is:

concription.no-ip.biz

first off, posting your server Ip is a big mistake, and only trust…people you can “really” trust with your password… like someone you know IRL.
[/quote]
That didnt solved my problem… -.-[/quote]
No, but it’ll solve an even bigger problem that you will have in the future.

Read full topic
